description:
1) Fixed the bass line so it would sound like the one in the studio record. Some minor adjustments may be required, but this one is closer to the original bass line anyway.
2) Fixed weird pauses and notes' length in Tracks 1, 2, 4 (like measure 69 in Track 2 of the initial revision) that do not fit the time signature and are obviously a mistake.
